species.name: meltan
descriptions: It dissolves and eats metal. Circulating liquid metal within its body is how it generates energy.
It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.
They live as a group, but when the time comes, one strong Meltan will absorb all the others and evolve.

abilities.name: magnet-pull
abilities.effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.
